name: Stellar Lantern
description: A delicate lantern crafted from a shell that seems to hold within it a piece of captured starlight. Its gentle glow appears to pulse in sync with the whispers carried on the desert breeze.

name: Crystal Focus
description: A crystal shard, polished by the shifting sands into a perfect sphere. It reflects an image of the dunes themselves, as if it were a portal looking back at the ever-changing landscape outside.
